channel.title: java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection(jdk/jre)portforwad
channel.description:
Ok guys I was not sure where to post this so I thought java stuff goes here so i installed jre6 with my computer after i formated then I downloaded jdk1.6.0_29-jdk1.7.0-jre7.............. and now on all of them when I use to run a source i keep getting errors even if its recognized to my computer here is an error:- [code] [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: java.io.IOExc eption: Unable to establish loopback connection [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:106 ) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(PipeImpl.java:122) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(SelectorProv iderImpl.java:27) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Pipe.java:133) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(WindowsSelector Impl.java:104) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Windo wsSelectorProvider.java:26) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Selector.java:209) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:127) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: co nnect [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Native Method) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(SocketChannelImp l.java:500) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(SocketChannel.ja va:146) [10/23/11 8:57 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:78)
[10/23/11 8:57 PM]: ... 10 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code] (this is on jdk1.6.0_29)
And I searched this problem but I didn't find what helps me all I know is that I should portforward to it but 2 things I don't know:
1-How to get java/jre/jdk ports 2-how to portforward them on firewall
Thanks because I really hate it I can't get my server back up again or play any webclient for errors I get, Thanks.

item.title: java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection(jdk/jre)portforwad
item.dc:creator: @skullz_scoop skullz scoop
item.description:
@skullz_scoop wrote:

When I searched for

java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection
They all said something in the firewall blocking it, but not on how to fix it. (on google)

Read full topic

item.title: java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection(jdk/jre)portforwad
item.dc:creator: @skullz_scoop skullz scoop
item.description:
@skullz_scoop wrote:

What I meant is that my firewall is blocking it from connecting out so it won’t work, even so I added an expetions for java.exe but I still get

java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection
And by ports I meant isnt it blocked I would like to know how to find out my java ports (####-####/TCP-UDP) so I might try to portforward them.

Read full topic
